pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing expulsion
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:4.1: 8. The training rule having eight parts
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:5.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:5.2: At that time the nuns from the group of six, being lustful and aiming to indulge in inappropriate sexual conduct, consented to lustful men holding their hand and the edge of their upper robes, and they stood with them, chatted with them, went to appointments with them, consented to men coming, entered covered places with them, and disposed their body for that purpose.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:6.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:6.2: “How could the nuns from the group of six do these things?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:6.3: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns do these things?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:6.6: How can the nuns from the group of six, being lustful and aiming to indulge in inappropriate sexual conduct, consent to lustful men holding their hand and the edge of their upper robes, and how can they stand with them, chat with them, go to appointments with them, consent to men coming, enter concealed places with them, and dispose their body for that purpose?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:6.7: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:6.8: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:7.1: ‘If, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, a lustful nun consents to a lustful man holding her hand or consents to him holding the edge of her upper robe or stands with him or chats with him or goes to an appointment with him , or she consents to a man coming to her or enters a concealed place with him or disposes her body for him for that purpose, she too is expelled and excluded from the community. The training rule having eight parts.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:8.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:9.2: having lust, longing for, in love with.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:10.2: having lust, longing for, in love with.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:11.2: a human male, not a male spirit, not a male ghost, not a male animal. He understands and is capable of making physical contact.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:12.2: from the elbow to the tip of the nails is called “hand.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:12.3: If, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, she consents to him holding her above the collar bone or below the knees, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:13.1: Or consents to him holding the edge of her upper robe:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:13.2: if, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, she consents to him holding her sarong or upper robe, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:14.2: if, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, she stands within arm’s reach of a man, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:15.2: if, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, she stands within arm’s reach of a man, chatting with him, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:16.1: Or goes to an appointment with him:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:16.2: if, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, she goes to such-and-such a place when told to do so, then for every step, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:16.3: For the mere entering within arm’s reach of the man, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:17.1: Or she consents to a man coming to her:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:17.2: if, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, she consents to a man coming to her, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:17.3: When he enters within arm’s reach, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:18.1: Or enters a concealed place with him:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:18.2: if, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, she merely enters a concealed place with any man, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:19.1: Or disposes her body for him for that purpose:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:19.2: if, for the purpose of indulging in inappropriate sexual conduct, she disposes her body for a man while standing within arm’s reach of him, she commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:20.2: this is said with reference to the preceding offenses entailing expulsion.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:21.2: just as a palm tree with its crown cut off is incapable of further growth, so a nun who fulfills the eight parts is not an ascetic, not a daughter of the Sakyan— therefore it is said “she is expelled.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:22.2: Community: common legal procedures, a joint recitation, the same training— this is called “community.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:22.3: She does not take part in this— therefore it is called “excluded from the community.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:23.9: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:24.1: The eighth offense entailing expulsion is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:25.1: “Venerables, the eight rules entailing expulsion have been recited.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:25.2: If a nun commits any one of them, she is no longer part of the community of nuns. As before, so after, she is expelled and excluded from the community.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:25.3: In regard to this I ask you,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:25.9: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:26.1: The chapter on offenses entailing expulsion in the nuns’ analysis is finished.
